amendatorysection.catchline: Auditor of Public Accounts; annual audit; report to Clerk of the Legislature.
amendatorysection.para: It shall be the duty of the Auditor of Public Accounts to make an annual audit of the retirement system and submit electronically an annual report to the Clerk of the Legislature of its condition. Each member of the Legislature shall receive an electronic copy of such report by making a request for it to the Auditor of Public Accounts.
